source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens with a seal positioned in the foreground at the bottom center of the frame, viewed from a high angle. In the background, multiple horizontal rows of lotus flowers occupy the top half of the scene. A procession of penguins on platforms then enters from the right side of the frame, moving left across the middle ground, positioned behind the seal. As they pass, the seal, remaining in its foreground position, raises its flippers. The penguins continue moving left until they exit the frame, after which the seal also disappears from the bottom. The scene then transitions to a view of three elephants standing in a row, occupying the center of the frame in the middle ground, with the lotus flower pattern still visible in the background. The camera perspective for the elephants appears to be at their eye level.
